scripts.backend:install: cd "../Backend_Files/lunar-almanac-backend" && python3 -m venv .venv && .venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && .venv/bin/pip install -r prod_server/requirements.txt
scripts.backend: sh -c 'cd "../Backend_Files/lunar-almanac-backend" && if [ ! -x .venv/bin/uvicorn ]; then python3 -m venv .venv && .venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && .venv/bin/pip install -r prod_server/requirements.txt; fi; exec .venv/bin/uvicorn prod_server.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000'
scripts.dev:both: concurrently -k -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c blue,green "npm run backend" "npm run dev"
